title: Hextech Chests
body:
Look, it's hard enough as it is to try and get orange/blue essence, why isn't there an option, in where we can disenchant them into little amounts of essence, I'm trying to get a dunkmaster darius skin, and I'm legit 5 orange essence off, it bugs me since it took me ages to get key fragments. Please just make it so you can disenchant the hextech chests into 5 orange or blue essence, please I'm begging you.
Thanks BOTClarence.

replies.body: Idk why haxtech crafting is so unnecessarily complicated. You need to get key fragments and chests, makes the keys, unlock the chests, hope you get something even good then get enough dust to actually make the thing. Loot is way better in Overwatch, just open and its yours.
